kizuna_math_a_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh, my. If it isn’t [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
Hello there.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_02: Do you perhaps have a question about class?[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_05:
What were you having trouble with? Let’s have a
little review here, shall we?[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_06:
Hahaha. I’m glad to hear it! Then perhaps you
won’t mind a little quiz.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_07:
Flying-type Pokémon are weak to Rock-type
moves.\c
When a Rock-type move hits a Flying-type
Pokémon, what becomes of the move’s damage?[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_08a:
Yes, that’s right! The correct answer is that the
move’s damage is doubled.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_08b:
Oh dear. The correct answer is that the move’s
damage is doubled. But I appreciate you trying![VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_09:
Oh, my. I see one of my more energetic students
is here to see me. You’ll have to wait your turn,\r
dear! There is only one of me, after all.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_mob_02:
Um, Ms. Tyme? Is it true that you were a Gym
Leader?!
kizuna_math_a_10:
That is indeed true. I’m quite the strong battler,
you know![VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_mob_03: Wow! That’s so cool! Why’d you quit?
kizuna_math_a_11:
So you want to know, do you? I might be
persuaded to tell you if you wait your turn.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_mob_04: OK! I can wait my turn! I sure can!
kizuna_math_a_12:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I’m sorry for cutting our conversation short,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)],\r
but\r
I\r
seem\r
to\r
be\r
in\r
high\r
demand today.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_13:
Feel free to come see me any time if you have
questions for me.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_a_system_01: You became slightly closer with Ms. Tyme!
